author: Michael Moore
method: Take some sausages and cook in pan then slice lengthways (only half way through though). Take the flour, egg and milk and mix into a batter. Plate sausages into dish and pour batter around them. Place in oven 180C/350F/Gas 4. Cook it for 35 to 40 minutes. Take it out of the oven when its golden brown and let it rest. Take diced vegetables (celery, tomatoes and apples) and place in a bowl all together. Take butter, melt in a pan, add brown sugar, white wine vinegar, sweet chilli sauce and tomato paste. Cook out for five minutes, add the diced vegetables to the salsa, allow to cool and then add chopped herbs. Pour over sausages and serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 pork sausages,  100g/3½oz flour,  4 eggs,  ½ litre milk,  25g/1oz butter,  50g/2oz tomato concasse,  50g/2oz celery,  50g/2oz apple,  25g/1oz white wine vinegar,  20g/¾oz brown sugar,  10g/½oz tomato paste,  10g/½oz sweet chilli sauce,  herbs of your choice
